div.p: Group 1 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MessageHeader|5.0.0 to unspecified code system

tr.td: FHIR R5 Resource `MessageHeader` is representable via FHIR R4 Resource `MessageHeader`. Element `MessageHeader` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `MessageHeader`.
Element `MessageHeader.meta` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `MessageHeader.meta`.
Element `MessageHeader.implicitRules` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `MessageHeader.implicitRules`.
Element `MessageHeader.language` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `MessageHeader.language`.
Element `MessageHeader.text` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `MessageHeader.text`.
Element `MessageHeader.contained` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `MessageHeader.contained`.

Note that the target element context `MessageHeader.event[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `MessageHeader`. Element `MessageHeader.event[x]` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `MessageHeader.event[x]`. Note that the target element context `MessageHeader.event[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `MessageHeader`.
Element `MessageHeader.destination` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `MessageHeader.destination`.
Element `MessageHeader.destination.endpoint[x]` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `MessageHeader.destination.endpoint`.
Element `MessageHeader.destination.name` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `MessageHeader.destination.name`.
Element `MessageHeader.destination.target` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `MessageHeader.destination.target`.
Element `MessageHeader.destination.receiver` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `MessageHeader.destination.receiver`.

Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `MessageHeader.sender` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`. Element `MessageHeader.sender` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `MessageHeader.sender`.

Element matches Basic element path `Basic.author`, use that element instead. Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `MessageHeader.author` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`. Element `MessageHeader.author` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `MessageHeader.author`.
Element `MessageHeader.source` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `MessageHeader.source`.
Element `MessageHeader.source.endpoint[x]` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `MessageHeader.source.endpoint`.
Element `MessageHeader.source.name` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `MessageHeader.source.name`.
Element `MessageHeader.source.software` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `MessageHeader.source.software`.
Element `MessageHeader.source.version` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `MessageHeader.source.version`.
Element `MessageHeader.source.contact` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `MessageHeader.source.contact`.
Element `MessageHeader.responsible` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `MessageHeader.responsible`.
Element `MessageHeader.reason` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `MessageHeader.reason`.
Element `MessageHeader.response` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `MessageHeader.response`.
Element `MessageHeader.response.identifier` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `MessageHeader.response.identifier`.
Element `MessageHeader.response.code` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `MessageHeader.response.code`.
Element `MessageHeader.response.details` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `MessageHeader.response.details`.
Element `MessageHeader.focus` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `MessageHeader.focus`.
Element `MessageHeader.definition` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `MessageHeader.definition`.

title.value: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4

description.value: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.
